data.title: Alexandre Nikolaïevich BENOIS (Saint Petersburg, 1870-Pa…
data.meta_description:
Alexandre Nikolaïevich BENOIS (Saint Petersburg, 1870-Paris, 1960)
Project for the set of Abel Gance's film La fin du Monde (1929).
Graphite drawing on paper, signed lower left and annotated upper right in French "La fin du monde pour Gance. And then I can't take it anymore it's too stupid" and in Russian "Fin IV 1929".
H. 31,5 x W. 23 cm.

History
The End of the World is a film directed by Abel Gance and released in 1931; it is the first talking film by Gance.

Provenance:
Collection of Alexandre Benois then by descent to the current owner.
